parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~26232~~) operation to query the IDs of instances.

parameters.name: EncryptionKey
parameters.description: The ID of the custom key.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~26243~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: TargetRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~26243~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
